scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains oversized materials related to the Hunt-Morgan family including several letters, a receipt, and a land deed. Copies of materials from 1861 are stored in Box 15, Folders 7, 8, and 9; copies of materials from 1862-1863 are stored in Box 16, Folders 1, 9, 10, and 11; and copies of materials from 1864-1865 are stored in Box 17, Folders 1 and 5.
